trans-unit.target:
TEXT_BANANA408_03057_SEQ_00<tab>Eshana seems unusually skittish.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
TEXT_BANANA408_03057_TODO_00<tab>Search the designated locations, subdue impure bhoots, then purify your targets using sanctified saltwater.

TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you could not have come at a better time! We have need of a champion─a brave hero who ssstands firm in the face of faceless horror!

TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_001<tab>There have been reportsss of bhootsss, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, and my sssisters at Vira Nilya have tasssked usss with exorcising these ragged ssspecters.
TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_002<tab>Here. Make your way to the Ssstriped Hills. Sssubdue any bhootsss you encounter, then douse them with this sssanctified sssaltwater. Be thorough.
TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_010<tab>...Are they gone? You didn't...touch them, did you?

TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_011<tab>Ananta legend has it that those who ssso much as brush the rags of a bhoot will be cursssed. Your hair will melt away, your ssscales rot, and your eyes fade to a milky white...

TEXT_BANANA408_03057_ESHANA_000_012<tab>For we who cherish beauty above all elssse, the very thought of sssuch pessstilent phantoms is nauseating. I truly appreciate you carrying out this dissstasteful tasssk on our behalf.
